thread.title: How far does school dinner chicken travel?
thread.title_full: How far does school dinner chicken travel?

title: How far does school dinner chicken travel?
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device How far does school dinner chicken travel? 28 February 2017 Last updated at 23:59 GMT 
School children are being served chicken produced 6,000 miles away in Thailand, a BBC investigation has found. 
Scottish government ministers have repeatedly called for supermarkets and shops to buy local. 
But the BBC investigation found Scottish councils were spending millions importing food from abroad which could be sourced in Scotland. 
Glasgow alone spends Â£1.3m a year on food sourced outside the UK.
